title: Turned Gay On A Billionaire's Yacht
description: After meeting a dark and mysterious man at an LA nightclub, Kyle is escorted back to a party he is having on his yacht. Kyle is blown away by this billionaire's interest in him as he begins to take him on a tour of the private areas of the luxurious ship. What he does next will reveal some of Kyle's wildest and craziest fantasies he never knew he even had!  This is a 5,200 word hardcore gay erotic short story. It includes rough sex, BDSM, dubcon, anal, oral, straight-to-gay, double penetration and more!
author: Vince Jenner
